name: nestflux
description: Scaffold app for ReactJS + NestJS projects (fully written in TS)

scripts.dev: tmux new-session -d -s nestflux 'pnpm dev:client' \; split-window -h 'pnpm dev:server' \; attach-session -d
scripts.prod:client: pnpm --filter nestflux-client build && pnpm --filter nestflux-client start
scripts.prod: tmux new-session -d -s nestflux 'pnpm prod:client' \; split-window -h 'pnpm prod:server' \; attach-session -d
